patthana22.31:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana22.31:1.1_0: One who doesnâ€™tobsessed overly. He speaks of the teaching, the cause of a reason formise.
patthana22.31:2.1_0: if there is no ties of taking up the desire for outside, not the uprooting of the underlying tendencies.
patthana22.31:3.1_0: One who has not desire to cross over the flood by relying on the flood, nor by means of not the flood.
patthana22.31:5.1_0: Taking material possessions is not a cause of desire.
patthana22.31:7.1_0: Not taking up the hindrances of the hindrance of sensual desire, not the hindrance of ill will.
patthana22.31:9.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the undefiled teaching.
